# coa

coa introduces compound assignment operators

<!-- badges: start -->
[![CRAN status](https://www.r-pkg.org/badges/version/coa)](https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=coa)
<!-- badges: end -->

## Installation

You can install the development version of coa using:

``` r
devtools::install_github("git@github.com:Noza23/coa.git")
```

## Example

This is a basic example which shows you how to solve a common problem:

```{r example}
library(coa)
x <- 10
print(x %+=% 1)
print(x %-=% 5)
print(x %*=% 2)
print(x %/=% 5)
print(x %c=% 1:5)
print(`++`(x))
print(`--`(x))
```
